General.Name: Makkah Construction&Development Co
General.Description: Makkah Construction & Development Company invests in, buys, develops, owns, manages, and rents real estate properties in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It also undertakes engineering, construction, reconstruction, maintenance, demolition, and survey works. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Mecca, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
